title: 16.7 update fail
body: im not sure if the update is really failing for me it show up a update fail window and when i exit out of it the update is still going but going the files scanned aren't going as fast as the last updates and the last ones didn't have a update fail window oops that was suppose to be 6.17

replies.body:
The patcher needs to scan and update files, and how long that takes can depend on your PC.  As long as you are not receiving any errors, it's best to leave it alone.  Closing it can cause the patcher to have to scan all of your files to check for corruption before proceeding with the update.  If you are still having issues, go over our[ patching issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)guide to help get this fixed up.  Let me know if you still have any issues afterwords, and with additional details!

Also:  I don't think 6.17 has been released yet!
